Replies.Author: Matthew Strand
Replies.Content: How true this is. I’ll look forward to the rest of the semester and do my best to burn this horror from my mind.

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content: This post is hilarious. If you continue to have time for this, you might as well keep on keepin’ on.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content:
What do you mean that’s for me? You know nothing about me, man. Well, if they didn’t have that horns, maybe. Or if they were a little bit shorter. Or if they were holding hands. Or if they looked cuter. Or if they… you know what? They are just not my type. I’d rather have Cure White.

No, seriously. I liked her even before there were 19 other Precures. (since Cure Black came out at the same time) I just didn’t tell anyone because I really haven’t watched the show, and I feared people might not understand me. But after seeing Gene like that, I finally have enough courage to say it.

And I thought I should link this. [http://www.pixiv.net/member\_illust.php?mode=medium&illust\_id=19033373](http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=19033373)

Replies.Author: dante
Replies.Content:
I’m sorry, all I heard was that they need to be tag teaming, wide-eyed, and less horny. You know, like the girls in Precure.

And don’t worry, Chaeha. We would never make fun of you for liking Precure…

to your face…

unless we were the CSM Anime Club…

that trolls from the front…

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Cure Black’s the bomb. Kicks butt and doesn’t afraid of anything. I’m more of a Melody fan myself, from Suite. None of her moves make sense, but that’s ok she’s taller than all the other precure. I think.

HAHA CHAEHA LIKES PRETTY CURE.

Replies.Author: Chaeha
Replies.Content: Dude, I don’t like Precure yet. I just like Cure White. And White is better than Black, and you know it. Wait, did I say something bad?

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
White’s ok, but man, black just kicks so much butt. White’s like, the support character while Black is more like the awesome tank in the party. What I’m saying is, I’d rather have Black in my party than White.

OH GOD WHY AM I DISCUSSING THIS.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content: This was pretty great. You guys should have fired me sooner.

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content: Ok, NOW you’re fired! You can pick up your check and oversized sword at the front desk. You’re entitled to a trip to taco bell with the asshole row next showing too.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
But I’ll miss C if I have to go to Taco Bell with you jackoffs.

But then again, food. I dunno, Gene.

Replies.Author: Kevin L
Replies.Content: I’m not sure where you found the Masasaki contract picture, but I just thought I’d let you know that I’m stealing it, because it might be the greatest thing I have seen in my life. Also, this whole post was epic.
